body.name: JADENS Portable Printers Wireless for Travel, Support 8.5" X 11" US Letter, Bluetooth Thermal Printer Compatible with iOS, Android & Laptop, Inkless Mobile Printer for Office, Home, School
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 23 hrs 48 mins
features: Cost-Effective, Ink-Free Printing: The mobile phone printers offers an economical solution for everyday printing needs, eliminating the need for ink, toner, and ribbons. Print recipes, forms, letters, assignments, study materials, and travel documents hassle-free with advanced thermal technology. Each thermal paper costs only $0.07, resulting in substantial savings of hundreds of dollars per year. Perfect for home, small office, and school use. (Note: JADENS Portable printer is a thermal printer and only supports thermal paper, not support regular copy paper)

Easy Portability for On-the-Go Printing: Take printing wherever you need it with our mobile bluetooth printer. Whether it's in your car, backpack, or during business trips, JADENS portable printers wireless is your reliable companion for emergency scenarios, contracts, office documents, inventory lists, business checks, shipping labels, boarding passes, and more.

Effortless Setup via Bluetooth or USB: Our mobile sticker printer easily connects to smart devices with iOS & Android systems via Bluetooth, and also functions as a compact printer for laptops and computers. Setup takes just 5 minutes from unboxing, making it a breeze to get started. (Note: For smartphone printing, please download the app in advance. For laptops, install the driver first.)

Crisp Printing Quality & Long Battery Life: Experience crystal-clear printing with our portable travel printer, featuring 2 built-in 2600mAh batteries for continuous printing of up to 3 hours and 360 sheets on a single charge. With a remarkable 90 days standby time, this wireless printer is a must-have for businessmen and students on the move.

Adjustable Paper Sizes & Reliable After-Sale Support: Print documents ranging from 2 to 8.5 inches in size, accommodating various needs. We are committed to providing exceptional after-sale service, offering lifetime tech support via phone and email. Whether you have inquiries before or after using our portable wireless printer, our dedicated team is here to assist you promptly and effectively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool gadget! Heavy thing but super handy
reviews.reviewText: I need to print out invoices on the spot and this machine works great! I use paper sheets instead of the roll as the roll curls up and doesn't present an invoice well. No ink is needed will save you so much trouble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used it yesterday, worked great. Not 100% quality like a regular printer but it's ok for quick, easy print jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing idea but paper costs are ridiculous!
reviews.reviewText: I desperately wanted to love this printer because I have a Jaden’s thermal label printer that I love. It’s super compact, lightweight, prints quickly, you can charge it and use it without it being plugged in, take it with you in a purse or backpack, there’s a third party zip holder you can get, it’s bluetooth/wireless, and has an easy set up on an iPhone app. (note that I’m already used to how Jaden‘s printing works so it was easier for me to set this one up then when I had to learn how to do the thermal label printer-it’s a little different than typical printers). Unfortunately, I didn’t realize that the paper that thermal printers use is essentially fax paper, which are very thin. Youths-google fax machine ;)Also, good luck writing on it with ink without it smearing all over. I think they sell special markers to write on it. But that’s more $$$. If you use the paper rolls, the print out won’t be flat. For this, I recommend getting the flat paper that has perforated edges that they sell, but that paper also has its own issues which I will review separately. Paper costs about $20 per hundred pages, which is a lot compared to regular printer paper and the cost of ink! some things to note (about this one and other thermal printers): it doesn’t print double sided, you can’t print in color (it uses heat and not ink), and paper runs out very quickly.I exchanged it for a cheap ink printer (with a scanner, copier, and fax that thermal printers don’t have) that gives 6 months of free ink and paper. It goes through ink like I’ve never seen before but my other ink printer broke after many years.I think this printer would be good for certain people depending on your needs. Unfortunately, it didn’t meet my needs.I ended up returning and getting a regular ink printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nothing but a headache
reviews.reviewText: I was exited to get this printer. But getting set up was a nightmare. The directions given did not work. I spent days downloading different drivers, changing settings, etc. I don't know what I did, but it finally worked. ONE time. Since then, I get error messages, print jobs stuck in the queue, or absolutely nothing happens. It is paired with my laptop, laptop Bluetooth is on, but nothing happens. If I plug it in with a USB cable, the button turns red. I needed a label printed for tomorrow, but it won't work, so, I'm out $200. Great. It's going in the trash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this printer!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s really small and compact, convenient for my dorm room. It came with a roll of paper in it already and refills are pretty cheap too ($20 for 4 rolls I believe). I love the design of the printer and it prints pretty dark! The only thing I don’t like is that the paper comes out rolled (because it’s literally in a roll) and that it doesn’t print double sided. It’s not that big of a deal though since i can just flatten the paper out myself and I can deal with one-sided sheets.Also, I don’t know if it’s relevant but I have an IOS and the app works perfectly with my phone. Not sure how well it works for Android. Other than that, I would recommend this printer <3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up and decent quality prints
reviews.reviewText: Really like this printer!! Just needed something to print an occasional document at home, super easy to set up, quality is good for my needs, no real complaints so far. I did purchase the 3 year extended warranty just because I read some reviews on several of these types of printers that there can be problems- extended warranty around $14 so not too expensive, and hopefully won’t need it. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Far So Good
reviews.reviewText: Although we have just set this up and used this a few times. It was relatively easy to set up with the app and no big hassle. After setting up the printer we did a few quick test prints with no issues at all. We are excited to have this be a part of our home office setup and have the ability to be portable. Not to mention, inkless!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NOT FOR GOOGLE PRODUCTS
reviews.reviewText: I was super excited for this purchase, but I have a Pixel & a Chromebook. Neither of those will run the printing app or connect with it. However, my husband has a Samsung phone & it works great! Set up was so easy & quick! It connected right away & printed easily. The printed page was very clear. I love it!!

I wanted a printer I could carry with me, but found it quite heavy for how it looks. However, I weighed it and it’s exactly as the description states. I checked other portable printers and they are even heavier, so that’s just how they are. Having said that, it’s great…easy to use, portable, and there is quite a bit of paper on the roll. I would definitely recommend this printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Started printing within a couple of minutes from me phone. Ideal to use in the van on site 👍
Love this, easy to use, works well, compact and easy to put away. Best purchase!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great for printing on the road!
reviews.reviewText: IF you're away from home and need to print a receipt or postage label, this does the job.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for on the go and, simple B&W illustrations or text
reviews.reviewText: Took only seconds to set up and connect. Prints really fast. Knowing it's thermal printing, I knew not to expect high resolution. My first attempt to print I was disappointed at the photo, but later realized that I selected Text and not Image on the app, so I am pleased with the second attempt. As you can see in my photos the difference in the two prints and also the size of the printer compared to my hand. The app also allows you to create labels on the fly. The roll that fits in the printer is not very wide, so I am not sure how many 8x10 pages it yields.
